actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (
	SELECT name,video_id,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE case when '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date > '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date
		then view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date 
	else 
		view_date = '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date end
and name is not null),
CTE_view_date as (
	SELECT name,video_id,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE case when '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date > '{{moment().add(-2,'day')}}':: date
		then view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date 
	else 
		view_date = '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date end
and name is not null)
select CTE_sumtotal.name,
sum(CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views,0)) as total_video_view 
from CTE_sumtotal full join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
where CTE_sumtotal.name is not null
group by CTE_sumtotal.name
order by total_video_view desc
limit 10;
